name: Penguin's Boring Adventure
description:
Penguin's Boring Adventure

Want to waste your time and not have fun? Want to be bored out of your frickin mind? Then may I suggest you play this game, Penguin's Boring Adventure.

Penguin's Boring Adventure is a game, though just barely. In this game, you play as a hungry penguin who has to walk step by step all the way to the supermarket, because it's really far away for some reason.

Will you be able to endure the boredom and make it to the supermarket?

[All music in this game is taken from Super Mario Advance 4 - Super Mario Bros. 3]
